titles.title: White Spaces Act of 2007
A bill to require the FCC to issue a final order regarding white spaces, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: 1/18/2007--Introduced. White Spaces Act of 2007 - Directs the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) to complete its proceeding and issue a final order in the Matter of Unlicensed Operation in the TV Broadcast Bands, ET Docket No. 04-186 (concerning vacant, or "white space," spectrum between television channels) not later than 90 days after enactment of this Act or October 1, 2007.
